patthana22.35:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.35:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
